019package org.jgrapes.webconsole.base;
020
021import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper;
022import java.io.IOException;
023import java.util.Collections;
024import java.util.HashMap;
025import java.util.List;
026import java.util.Map;
027import java.util.Optional;
028import org.jgrapes.core.Channel;
029import org.jgrapes.core.Component;
030import org.jgrapes.core.Event;
031import org.jgrapes.core.annotation.Handler;
032import org.jgrapes.http.Session;
033import org.jgrapes.io.IOSubchannel;
034import org.jgrapes.util.events.KeyValueStoreQuery;
035import org.jgrapes.util.events.KeyValueStoreUpdate;
036import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.Conlet.RenderMode;
037import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.ConsoleLayoutChanged;
038import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.ConsolePrepared;
039import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.LastConsoleLayout;
040import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.RenderConletRequest;
041
042/**
043 * A component that restores the console layout
044 * using key/value events for persisting the data between sessions.
045 * 
046 * <img src="KVPPBootSeq.svg" alt="Boot Event Sequence">
047 * 
048 * This component requires another component that handles the key/value
049 * store events ({@link KeyValueStoreUpdate}, {@link KeyValueStoreQuery})
050 * used by this component for implementing persistence. When the web console 
051 * becomesready, this policy sends a query for the persisted data.
052 * 
053 * When the web console has been prepared, the policy sends the last layout
054 * as retrieved from persistent storage to the web console and then generates
055 * render events for all web console components contained in this layout.
056 * 
057 * Each time the layout is changed in the web console, the web console sends 
058 * the new layout data and this component updates the persistent storage
059 * accordingly.
060 * 
061 * @startuml KVPPBootSeq.svg
062 * hide footbox
063 * 
064 * actor System
065 * System -> KVStoreBasedConsolePolicy: ConsolePrepared
066 * activate KVStoreBasedConsolePolicy
067 * KVStoreBasedConsolePolicy -> "KV Store": KeyValueStoreQuery
068 * deactivate KVStoreBasedConsolePolicy
069 * activate "KV Store"
070 * "KV Store" -> KVStoreBasedConsolePolicy: KeyValueStoreData
071 * deactivate "KV Store"
072 * activate KVStoreBasedConsolePolicy
073 * KVStoreBasedConsolePolicy -> WebConsole: LastConsoleLayout
074 * activate WebConsole
075 * WebConsole -> Browser: "lastConsoleLayout"
076 * deactivate WebConsole
077 * loop for all conlets to be displayed
078 *     KVStoreBasedConsolePolicy -> ConletX: RenderConletRequest
079 *     activate ConletX
080 *     ConletX -> WebConsole: RenderConlet
081 *     deactivate ConletX
082 *     activate WebConsole
083 *     WebConsole -> Browser: "renderConlet"
084 *     deactivate WebConsole
085 * end
086 * deactivate KVStoreBasedConsolePolicy
087 * 
088 * Browser -> WebConsole: "consoleLayout"
089 * activate WebConsole
090 * WebConsole -> KVStoreBasedConsolePolicy: ConsoleLayoutChanged
091 * deactivate WebConsole
092 * activate KVStoreBasedConsolePolicy
093 * KVStoreBasedConsolePolicy -> "KV Store": KeyValueStoreUpdate
094 * deactivate KVStoreBasedConsolePolicy
095 * activate "KV Store"
096 * deactivate "KV Store"
097 * 
098 * @enduml
099 */
100public class KVStoreBasedConsolePolicy extends Component {
101
102    /** The mapper. */
103    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.FieldNamingConventions")
104    protected static final ObjectMapper mapper = new ObjectMapper();
105
106    /**
107     * Creates a new component with its channel set to
108     * itself.
109     */
110    public KVStoreBasedConsolePolicy() {
111        // Everything done by super.
112    }
113
114    /**
115     * Creates a new component with its channel set to the given channel.
116     * 
117     * @param componentChannel
118     */
119    public KVStoreBasedConsolePolicy(Channel componentChannel) {
120        super(componentChannel);
121    }
122
123    /**
124     * Create browser session scoped storage and forward event to it.
125     *
126     * @param event the event
127     * @param channel the channel
128     */
129    @Handler
130    public void onConsolePrepared(
131            ConsolePrepared event, ConsoleConnection channel) {
132        ((KVStoredLayoutData) channel.session().transientData()
133            .computeIfAbsent(KVStoredLayoutData.class,
134                key -> new KVStoredLayoutData(channel.session())))
135                    .onConsolePrepared(event, channel);
136    }
137
138    /**
139     * Forward layout changed event to browser session scoped storage.
140     *
141     * @param event the event
142     * @param channel the channel
143     * @throws IOException Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
144     */
145    @Handler
146    public void onConsoleLayoutChanged(ConsoleLayoutChanged event,
147            ConsoleConnection channel) throws IOException {
148        Optional<KVStoredLayoutData> optDs = Optional.ofNullable(
149            (KVStoredLayoutData) channel.session().transientData()
150                .get(KVStoredLayoutData.class));
151        if (optDs.isPresent()) {
152            optDs.get().onConsoleLayoutChanged(event, channel);
153        }
154    }
155
156    /**
157     * Caches the data in the session.
158     */
159    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.CommentRequired")
160    private class KVStoredLayoutData {
161
162        private final String storagePath;
163        private Map<String, Object> persisted;
164
165        public KVStoredLayoutData(Session session) {
166            storagePath = "/"
167                + WebConsoleUtils.userFromSession(session)
168                    .map(ConsoleUser::getName).orElse("")
169                + "/" + KVStoreBasedConsolePolicy.class.getName();
170        }
171
172        @SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.DataflowAnomalyAnalysis",
173            "PMD.AvoidInstantiatingObjectsInLoops" })
174        public void onConsolePrepared(
175                ConsolePrepared event, IOSubchannel channel) {
176            KeyValueStoreQuery query = new KeyValueStoreQuery(
177                storagePath, channel);
178            Event.onCompletion(query, e -> onQueryCompleted(e, channel,
179                event.event().renderSupport()));
180            fire(query, channel);
181        }
182
183        @SuppressWarnings("PMD.AvoidInstantiatingObjectsInLoops")
184        public void onQueryCompleted(KeyValueStoreQuery query,
185                IOSubchannel channel, RenderSupport renderSupport) {
186            try {
187                String data = Optional.ofNullable(query.get())
188                    .flatMap(m -> Optional.ofNullable(m.get(storagePath)))
189                    .orElse(null);
190                if (data == null) {
191                    persisted = new HashMap<>();
192                } else {
193                    persisted = mapper.readValue(data.getBytes(),
194                        mapper.getTypeFactory().constructMapType(Map.class,
195                            String.class, Object.class));
196                }
197            } catch (InterruptedException | IOException e) {
198                persisted = new HashMap<>();
199            }
200
201            // Make sure data is consistent
202            @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
203            List<String> previewLayout = (List<String>) persisted
204                .computeIfAbsent("previewLayout",
205                    newKey -> Collections.emptyList());
206            @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
207            List<String> tabsLayout = (List<String>) persisted.computeIfAbsent(
208                "tabsLayout", newKey -> Collections.emptyList());
209            Object xtraInfo = (Map<?, ?>) persisted.computeIfAbsent(
210                "xtraInfo", newKey -> new Object());
211
212            // Update (now consistent) layout
213            channel.respond(new LastConsoleLayout(
214                previewLayout, tabsLayout, xtraInfo));
215
216            // Restore conlets
217            for (String conletId : tabsLayout) {
218                fire(new RenderConletRequest(renderSupport, conletId,
219                    RenderMode.asSet(RenderMode.View)), channel);
220            }
221            for (String conletId : previewLayout) {
222                fire(new RenderConletRequest(renderSupport, conletId,
223                    RenderMode.asSet(RenderMode.Preview,
224                        RenderMode.Foreground)),
225                    channel);
226            }
227        }
228
229        public void onConsoleLayoutChanged(ConsoleLayoutChanged event,
230                IOSubchannel channel) throws IOException {
231            persisted.put("previewLayout", event.previewLayout());
232            persisted.put("tabsLayout", event.tabsLayout());
233            persisted.put("xtraInfo", event.xtraInfo());
234
235            // Now store.
236            fire(new KeyValueStoreUpdate().update(storagePath,
237                mapper.writer().writeValueAsString(persisted)), channel);
238        }
239
240    }
241}
